SamPy.resolve.misc.fluxCalibrateToSDSSÂ¶

This script can be used to flux calibrate an image slicer 2D spectra to SDSS one (of the same target).

requires:PyfITS
requires:NumPy
requires:SciPy
requires:matplotlib
requires:SamPy
author:Sami-Matias Niemi
contact:sniemi@unc.edu
version:0.3

Classes

OptionParser([usage, option_list, ...]) Class attributes:
calibrateToSDSS(configfile, debug[, section]) This class can be used to flux calibrate an image
